package.name: Conekta_Payment_Extension
package.summary: This extension allows you to process online and offline payments in your checkout using Conekta API.
package.notes: Support for PHP 5.6.4 Support for IWD_OPC checkout. Support for OneStepCheckout. Support for Monthly Installments and Config. Support for fraud detection in all pages. Add custom fields to card purchases for fraud detection. Add fields to card module for Riskified compatibility. Add fields to all modules for shipment details. Add Webhook module management. Add locale. Add detailed payment information in admin. Add detailed payment information on successful payment.
